channel.title: Getting Ideas from The Runescape Suggestions Forums
channel.description:
Hey guys.
Just curious if anyone's actually checked there for any interesting/unique ideas for minigames to implement into RSC private servers. A lot of ideas get thrown around on there, and whilst most are ridiculous, there's probably a few good ones too.
Just seems like a place to check out if you're looknig for something new.
http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?84,85,195,58564664 <-- Here's one I found that looks alright. (mind you, had to filter through lots of junk to get too.)
So what's you guys thoughts on getting ideas from the forums?
-J.

item.title: Getting Ideas from The Runescape Suggestions Forums
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

Gay mini game, but Meh…

-Kozy

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Ideas from The Runescape Suggestions Forums

item.title: Getting Ideas from The Runescape Suggestions Forums
item.dc:creator: @Jonesy1128 Jonesy1128
item.description:
@Jonesy1128 wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:1, topic:281030”]Come up with your own ideas, Ive seen posts lately that have been like “free server idea for a coding team”
Keep it all on one thread… This is useless to the community. Thanks for posting.[/quote]

I disagree.

This topic was set up to let users know that there are a lot of ideas around the Runescape forums. The thread I found was just an example to show you guys what I meant.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Ideas from The Runescape Suggestions Forums

So pest control without the portals >.>
